function.name: place_order
function.description: Places an order with the restaurant. Use this when the customer confirms they want to place their order.

items.description: Array of items the customer wants to order

item_id.description: The Square catalog object ID (variation ID) for the menu item

quantity.description: The quantity of this item (as a string, e.g., '1', '2')

modifiers.description: Optional array of modifier objects for customizations like 'no onions', 'extra cheese', etc.

catalog_object_id.description: The Square catalog object ID for the modifier

name.description: Human-readable name of the modifier (e.g., 'No Onions', 'Extra Cheese')
